summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of new splash-like design implementation. All design elements successfully implemented and functional. Verified centered icon circle, big brand heading with heart symbol, tagline, large pill CTA button, and consistent color scheme throughout the application.

backend_issues.note: Backend testing skipped as requested - frontend only testing

passed_tests: Home page loads successfully with new splash-like design
Centered circular icon with Camera symbol properly displayed
Big brand heading 'Amor por Fotos ♥' with heart symbol visible
Tagline 'Suas fotos reveladas com amor' properly positioned
Kicker text 'Toque para revelar sua história' displayed
Large pill CTA button 'Toque para Começar' is clickable and styled correctly
Start card container with proper rounded corners (28px) and white background
Footer 'Totem Amor por Fotos' displayed at bottom
Session creation works - clicking start button navigates to KioskSession
KioskSession page renders QR code correctly
Photo count badge shows '0' initially as expected
Print button correctly disabled with 0 photos
Idle countdown timer displays '300s' and functions
Session ID properly displayed at bottom of session page
Back to home navigation works correctly
Print URL structure verified (/print/:orderNumber?autoprint=1&combined=1)
Print page shows 'Pedido não encontrado' for non-existent orders (correct behavior)
Admin settings button accessible and navigates to admin page
Admin PIN modal displays correctly with proper styling
Color scheme consistency - primary color used in icon and CTA button
Text hierarchy properly implemented (text-6xl, text-3xl, text-base)
Gradient background element present
Logo displays correctly with proper source URL
Card styling with subtle shadow and proper spacing
All data-testid attributes present for robust testing
